secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook".

Okay, based on the examples provided by the game master ("pencil" and "notebook"), my best guess for the secret rule is that the items allowed in this game must be office supplies or stationery items.

The common characteristics between a "pencil" and a "notebook" are that they are both typical items found in an office or used for writing and taking notes. They are both common stationery or office supply items.

Therefore, my final guess for the secret rule in this "Guess the Rule" game is that the allowed items must be office supplies or stationery items.
